build.beforeBuildCommand: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "try { Set-Location ../frontend; if (Get-Command cnpm -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { cnpm run build } else { npm run build } ; Set-Location ../backend ; if (-not (Get-Command pyinstaller -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue)) { pip install pyinstaller } ; if (Test-Path requirements.runtime.txt) { pip install -r requirements.runtime.txt } elseif (Test-Path requirements.txt) { pip install -r requirements.txt } ; pyinstaller --clean --distpath dist backend.spec ; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force ../src-tauri/resources | Out-Null ; Copy-Item -Force dist/superAutoCutVideoBackend.exe ../src-tauri/resources/ ; Write-Host 'Backend packaged and copied' } catch { Write-Error $_ ; exit 1 }"

security.csp: default-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' http://127.0.0.1:* http://localhost:* ws://127.0.0.1:* ws://localhost:*; img-src 'self' data: blob:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'
